content:
Vendor Analysis Template: Video Offerings Comparison between Sanctuary Health, Mytonomy, and Krames HealthGuides

| Criteria | Sanctuary Health | Mytonomy | Krames HealthGuides |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Video Quality | Provides high-quality videos in 1080p and 4K resolutions | Offers HD quality videos | Provides standard quality videos |
| Video Topic Breadth | Offers a wide range of video topics covering various health conditions | Offers videos on general health topics as well as condition-specific videos | Offers videos on general health topics |
| Tech Integration Needs | Requires integration with their platform, which may require technical assistance | Integrates with EHR and telemedicine platforms, but also offers standalone access | Integrates with patient portals, EHR, and other healthcare platforms |
| Pricing Factors | Pricing is customized and varies based on the number of videos required and level of customization | Offers pricing on a per video basis and discounts on large volume purchases | Offers a subscription-based model with tiered pricing based on the number of patients |

Note: This vendor analysis template is for informational purposes only and should not be considered as a comprehensive evaluation of the vendors. Additional research and due diligence may be necessary before making a final decision.
